last_episode_to_air.name: The Beginning (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: When all hope is lost, Cole must complete his cycle so that his younger self will one day arrive at the end with the answer.

name: 12 Monkeys
overview: The provocative story of Cole, a time traveler from a decimated future in a high-stakes race against the clock. Utilizing a dangerous and untested method of time travel, he journeys from 2043 to the present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will all but annihilate the human race.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Follow the journey of a time traveler from the post-apocalyptic future who appears in present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will eventually decimate the human race.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two finds Cole unable to travel back in time due to an unforeseen paradox. Meanwhile, Jennifer appears to be on the brink of unleashing the deadly virus. Every action has history-altering potential in this mind-bending race against time.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: With the identity of the Witness - the engineer of the reality ending Army of the 12 Monkeys - now known, Cole and his allies must travel through different eras in history to stop him.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: In Season 4, James Cole and Dr. Cassandra Railly set out on an epic quest, traveling further back in time than they have ever been before. According to legend, their only hope lies with a weapon capable of stopping the Witness for good. But they'll soon discover that in order to win the final battle and save time itself, they will have to make the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.name: Splinter
episodes.overview: 27 years after a virus wipes out most of humanity, scientists send a man back to 2015 to stop the plague from ever happening. Cole's only lead is a virologist, who knows the dangerous source of the outbreak.

episodes.name: Mentally Divergent
episodes.overview: The trail of a mysterious organization called the “Army of the 12 Monkeys” leads Cole to a mental institution in 2015, where a patient holds the key to the plague that destroys the world. Meanwhile, despite warnings that her involvement may disrupt the course of history, Dr. Railly risks her life to help him.

episodes.name: Cassandra Complex
episodes.overview: Cole's search for the location of the virus leads him to 2014, and to a devastating moment in Dr. Railly's life involving a dangerous outbreak in Haiti.

episodes.name: Atari
episodes.overview: A fight for the future ensues when a dangerous band of marauders hunting for Cole and Ramse threatens the mission to save the past.

episodes.name: The Night Room
episodes.overview: Cole and Dr. Railly face off with the Army of the 12 Monkeys when both discover the Night Room –- an off-site, black ops lab that houses the virus that will one day destroy the world.

episodes.name: The Red Forest
episodes.overview: When the tragic events of the Night Room create an alternate reality in 2043, Cole risks his future.

episodes.name: The Keys
episodes.overview: Cole, Dr. Railly and Aaron strive to stop the virus from being deployed as a bioweapon in Chechnya.

episodes.name: Yesterday
episodes.overview: The Core that powers the time machine is fading. To get Cole back from the past, Jones must convince her former colleagues at the military operation "Spearhead" that her mission is worth saving.

episodes.name: Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Cole finds himself in 2017 at the height of the plague. Out of options, Jones faces an impossible choice to replace the Core.

episodes.name: Divine Move
episodes.overview: Forces come to a head when Ramse does what it takes to protect his newfound family, leaving Cole to deal with the aftermath.

episodes.name: Shonin
episodes.overview: Cole splinters to Tokyo, 1987 in a last chance effort to stop the Army of the 12 Monkeys.

episodes.name: Paradox
episodes.overview: With Cole dying from the effects of time-travel, Railly must find the one person who can save him.

episodes.name: Arms of Mine
episodes.overview: Cole and Railly attempt a final confrontation with their closest enemies, while Jones faces a new threat to all that she's accomplished.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Follow the journey of a time traveler from the post-apocalyptic future who appears in present day on a mission to locate and eradicate the source of a deadly plague that will eventually decimate the human race.

episodes.name: Year of the Monkey
episodes.overview: Cole and Ramse repair their broken friendship while on the run; Railly and Jones navigate an uncertain future in 2043.

episodes.name: Primary
episodes.overview: Cole gets stranded in 2016 after an attempt to destroy the virus changes the future. Jones and Railly deal with the consequences of the changed timeline.

episodes.name: One Hundred Years
episodes.overview: Despite the growing tension between them, Cole and Cassie time travel to New York during World War II to track down a dangerous member of the Twelve.

episodes.name: Emergence
episodes.overview: When Cole and Cassie are stranded in 1944, Jones must turn to the person she trusts the least to bring them home -- Ramse. For Ramse, this mission will give him a chance to atone for his sins -- but can he mend the broken relations between Cole and Railly? Meanwhile, Jones visits Old Jennifer Goines to explore the true nature of Time - and the Twelve’s method to destroy it.

episodes.name: Bodies of Water
episodes.overview: In the present, Cassie and Jennifer Goines run from the 12 Monkeys; in 2044, Cole and Ramse face off against Deacon.

episodes.name: Immortal
episodes.overview: Cole and Ramse travel to 1970s New York City to prevent the Twelve from murdering a Vietnam veteran with a connection to the Witness.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: Cole faces the Witness as Cassie's hallucinations evolve; deadly visitors from the past arrive when the time machine malfunctions and begins tearing apart time and space.

episodes.name: Lullaby
episodes.overview: Jones comes to the disheartening realization that time travel is humanity's true enemy and that as its architect she needs to be stopped, and so she sends Railly back to the year 2020 with orders to undo all of it.

episodes.name: Hyena
episodes.overview: To save the last Primary, Cole must turn to a mortal enemy. Plus: Jennifer Goines, radical revolutionary?

episodes.name: Fatherland
episodes.overview: Cole has his loyalty tested when Ramse and Railly go rogue, embarking on an unsanctioned mission that sends them to 1961 East Berlin. Once there, they have murder on their minds as they search for an unscrupulous German doctor who knows the location of "The Witness."

episodes.name: Resurrection
episodes.overview: With the temporal facility on the verge of destruction, Cole and Jones find themselves in the middle of a coup. After a violent encounter ends in an unexpected tragedy, Cole is sent back to 1957 in a last-ditch effort to save humanity while the rest embark on a caravan across the apocalypse to find Titan -- the stronghold of the Witness.

episodes.name: Blood Washed Away
episodes.overview: Cole and Railly attempt to stop the final paradox in the past while Ramse, Jennifer and Deacon struggle to survive the apocalypse in a last ditch effort to find the Witness.

episodes.name: Memory of Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Cole and Railly have finally found peace living in the past. When a mysterious woman with apocalyptic visions of the future tells Cole it's not over, he must do the unthinkable to save the world... and the woman he loves.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two finds Cole unable to travel back in time due to an unforeseen paradox. Meanwhile, Jennifer appears to be on the brink of unleashing the deadly virus. Every action has history-altering potential in this mind-bending race against time.

episodes.name: Mother
episodes.overview: In the apocalypse of 2163, a desperate Cole searches for Titan. Meanwhile, a captive Railly is faced with an impossible choice as the 12 Monkeys await the arrival of The Witness.

episodes.name: Guardians
episodes.overview: While searching for Jennifer Goines in post-WWI France, Cole and Jones encounter a dangerous group of time- travelers - the Guardians.

episodes.name: Enemy
episodes.overview: Bonds of trust are tested when Ramse returns to the facility with an old enemy held captive. How far will Cole and Jones go for the answers they need?

episodes.name: Brothers
episodes.overview: Ramse and Cole splinter to 2007 expecting either a trap - or a final chance to kill The Witness. But when Cole discovers a heartbreaking truth, he’ll discover that the mission was both.

episodes.name: Causality
episodes.overview: Out of time and in need of answers, Jennifer and Deacon are sent to 1989 to steal the a sacred document. Can Railly and Cole get to the Word first before it reveals the one secret they want kept?

episodes.name: Nature
episodes.overview: In 1953, Cole and Railly reunite with Agent Gale at the birth of the Army of the 12 Monkeys.

episodes.name: Nurture
episodes.overview: Cole and Railly find themselves at opposite ends of an unspeakable decision. Jones grows suspicious while Railly turns to an emotional ally for advice. All hell breaks loose during a massive fire-fight.

episodes.name: Masks
episodes.overview: Former friends, now enemies, race to find the Witness in 1904, who, at last, reveals his face.

episodes.name: Thief
episodes.overview: The reason why the Witness wants to destroy time and all reality is revealed.

episodes.name: Witness
episodes.overview: The final battle with the Witness begins.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: With the identity of the Witness - the engineer of the reality ending Army of the 12 Monkeys - now known, Cole and his allies must travel through different eras in history to stop him.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: The final conflict with the Army of the 12 Monkeys begins when the Witness returns to Project Splinter.

episodes.name: Ouroboros
episodes.overview: Travelers come face to face with ghosts from their past when they find themselves maneuvering around their own timelines.

episodes.name: 45 RPM
episodes.overview: Cassie travels back in time to confront a younger Olivia; Cole helps Jennifer find the meaning behind her final Primary vision.

episodes.name: Legacy
episodes.overview: Team Splinter goes back in time to the wild, wild frontier in search of a weapon to destroy the Witness.

episodes.name: After
episodes.overview: A clue to breaking the cycle leads Cole and Cassie to the 1960s. Christopher Lloyd returns as Zalmon Shaw, a devoted follower of the Witness.

episodes.name: Die Glocke
episodes.overview: The team infiltrates a Nazi gala to steal an artifact known as 'Die Glocke'. Their operation comes undone when French Resistance interferes and an unexpected guest arrives.

episodes.name: Daughters
episodes.overview: Jones sends Hannah back in time to 2007 on a personal mission that could be the key to everything.

episodes.name: Demons
episodes.overview: Everything changes when the team finally climbs the steps... and rings the bell in the Middle Ages.

episodes.name: One Minute More
episodes.overview: The beginning of the end as Cole and Cassie embark on their final mission.

episodes.name: The Beginning (1)
episodes.overview: The final battle against the Witness as the fate of time and mankind hangs in the balance. All the pieces finally come together to mark the end of the beginning.

episodes.name: The Beginning (2)
episodes.overview: When all hope is lost, Cole must complete his cycle so that his younger self will one day arrive at the end with the answer.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: In Season 4, James Cole and Dr. Cassandra Railly set out on an epic quest, traveling further back in time than they have ever been before. According to legend, their only hope lies with a weapon capable of stopping the Witness for good. But they'll soon discover that in order to win the final battle and save time itself, they will have to make the ultimate sacrifice.
